00058     function main($content,$conf)   {
00059         $this->conf=$conf;
00060         $this->pi_setPiVarDefaults();
00061                 
00062         $this->tx_init();
00063         $this->tx_loadLL();
00064 
00065         $this->fetchConfigValue('viewmode');
00066         $this->fetchConfigValue('detailviewPID');
00067         
00068         //DEBUG-CONFIG
00069         $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->debugOutput = true;
00070 
00071         
00072         $this->piVars['eventId'] = intVal($this->piVars['eventId']);
00073 
00074         
00075         if (!$this->piVars['eventId']) {
00076             $content = $this->listView();
00077         } else {
00078             $content=$this->detailViewEvent(
00079             $this->piVars['eventId'],
00080             array(
00081                     'subparts' => array('subject','datetime','series','notes','sermon','backlink'),
00082                     'backlink' => array('str' => $this->pi_getLL('back'), 'id' => $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id),
00083             ),
00084             $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->cObj->fileResource('EXT:servicemgr/res/esv.html'), '###SINGLEEVENTEL###')
00085             );
00086         }
00087 
00088         return $this->pi_wrapInBaseClass($content);
00089     }

00096     function listView() {
00097         switch ($this->conf['viewmode']) {
00098             CASE 'latest':
00099                 $content = $this->getLatest();
00100                 break;
00101             CASE 'archive':
00102             default:
00103                 $content = $this->getList();
00104         }
00105         return $content;
00106     }
00107     
00113     function getLatest() {
00114         $content = '';
00115         $subpart = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template,'###SERMONLIST_LATEST###');
00116         
00117         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00118             'uid, event, title, file, filedate, playtime, filesize, bitrate, album',   #select
00119             'tx_servicemgr_sermons', #from
00120             'hidden=0 and deleted=0',  #where
00121             '','uid DESC','0,1'
00122         );
00123         if ($res) {
00124             $sermon = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res);
00125             $event = $this->getSingleEvent($sermon['event']);
00126             $duty = $this->getSingleSchedule($sermon['event']);
00127             
00128             $allPreachers = $this->getTeamMembers($this->generalConf['PreacherTeamUID']);
00129             $preacher = $duty[$this->generalConf['PreacherTeamUID']];
00130             if (is_array($preacher)) {
00131                 $outPreacher = '';
00132                 foreach($allPreachers as $singlePreacher) {
00133                     if (in_array($singlePreacher['uid'], $preacher)) {
00134                         $outPreacher .= $this->tx_linkToPage(
00135                             $singlePreacher['name'],
00136                             $this->generalConf['preacherdetailPID'],
00137                             array('tx_feuser_pi2[showUid]' => $singlePreacher['uid'])
00138                         );
00139                     }
00140                 }
00141             }
00142             
00143             if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('audioplayer')) {
00144                 require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('audioplayer').'class.tx_audioplayer.php');
00145                 $audioplayer = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_audioplayer');
00146                 $audioplayer->init();
00147                 $audioplayer->setOptions(array('initialvolume'=>80,'animation'=>'no', 'width'=>250));
00148             }
00149             
00150             $downloadLink = $this->pi_linkToPage(
00151                 '<img src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('servicemgr').'res/disk.png" alt="download" title="download" />',
00152                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id, '',
00153                 array(
00154                     'eID' => 'tx_servicemgr_download',
00155                     'sermonid'=>$sermon['uid']
00156                 )
00157             );
00158                 
00159             $markers = array(
00160                 '###PREACHER###' => $outPreacher,
00161                 '###SUBJECT###' => $sermon['title'],
00162                 '###DATE###' => date('d.m.Y', $event['datetime']),
00163                 '###TIME###' => date('H:i', $event['datetime']),
00164                 '###DOWNLOAD###' => $downloadLink,
00165                 '###PLAYER###' => $audioplayer ? $audioplayer->getFlashPlayer($sermon['file'], $sermon['uid']) : '',
00166             );
00167             $content = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($subpart, $markers);
00168         }   
00169         return $content;
00170     }

00177     function getList() {
00178         //Template preparation
00179         $subpart = $this->cObj->getSubpart($this->template,'###SERMONLIST###');
00180         $headerrow = $this->cObj->getSubpart($subpart,'###HEADERROW###');
00181         $singlerow = $this->cObj->getSubpart($subpart,'###ROW###');
00182         $filearray = $this->cObj->getSubpart($subpart,'###FILES###');
00183 
00184         //substitue table header in template file
00185         $markerArray['###HDATE###'] = $this->pi_getLL('date');
00186         $markerArray['###HSUBJECT###'] = $this->pi_getLL('subject');
00187         $markerArray['###HFILE###'] = $this->pi_getLL('file');
00188         $subpartArray['###HEADERROW###'] = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($headerrow,$markerArray);
00189 
00190 
00191         $res = $GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->exec_SELECTquery(
00192             'uid, datetime, subject',   #select
00193             'tx_servicemgr_events', #from
00194             'hidden=0 and deleted=0'  #where
00195         );
00196 
00197         //substitue table rows in template
00198         if ($res) {
00199             
00200             if (t3lib_extMgm::isLoaded('audioplayer')) {
00201                 require_once(t3lib_extMgm::extPath('audioplayer').'class.tx_audioplayer.php');
00202                 $audioplayer = t3lib_div::makeInstance('tx_audioplayer');
00203                 $audioplayer->init();
00204                 $audioplayer->setOptions(array('initialvolume'=>'100','animation'=>'no'));
00205                 $audioplayer->setHeaders($audioplayer->renderVars());
00206                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['tx_servicemgr_pi2_sermonjs'] = '    <script type="text/javascript" src="typo3conf/ext/servicemgr/res/sermonplayer.js"></script>';
00207             }
00208         
00209             
00210             $eventRowsOutput = '';
00211             while ($row=$GLOBALS['TYPO3_DB']->sql_fetch_assoc($res)) {
00212                 $markerArray['###DATE###'] = date('d.m.Y', $row['datetime']);
00213                 $markerArray['###SUBJECT###'] = $this->tx_linkToPage(
00214                     $row['subject'],
00215                     $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00216                     array('tx_servicemgr_pi2[eventId]'=>$row['uid'])
00217                 );
00218 
00219                 $sermons = $this->getAudioFiles($row['uid']);
00220 
00221                 if (count($sermons) > 0) {
00222                     $audioFileOutput = '';
00223                     foreach ($sermons as $sermon) {
00224                         $markerArray['###FILETITLE###'] = (count($sermons)>1) ? $sermon['title'].' &#0150; ' : '';
00225                         $markerArray['###SIZE###'] = $this->formatBytes($sermon['filesize']);
00226                         $markerArray['###LENGTH###'] = $this->formatTime($sermon['playtime']);
00227                         $markerArray['###DOWNLOAD###'] = $this->pi_linkToPage(
00228                             '<img src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('servicemgr').'res/disk.png" alt="download" title="download" />',
00229                             $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id, '',
00230                             array(
00231                                 'eID' => 'tx_servicemgr_download',
00232                                 'sermonid'=>$sermon['uid']
00233                             )
00234                         );
00235                         $playLink['href'] = $this->cObj->getTypoLink_URL(
00236                             $GLOBALS['TSFE']->id,
00237                             array(
00238                                 'tx_servicemgr_pi2[eventId]' => $row['uid'],
00239                                 'tx_servicemgr_pi2[play]' => $sermon['uid'],
00240                             )
00241                         );
00242                         $playLink['onclick'] = $audioplayer ? 'sermonshowplayer('.$sermon['uid'].'); return false;' : '';
00243                         
00244                         $markerArray['###PLAY###'] = 
00245                             '<a href="'.$playLink['href'].'" onclick="'.$playLink['onclick'].'">'.
00246                             '<img src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('servicemgr').'res/control_play_blue.png" alt="play" title="Play" />'
00247                             .'</a>';
00248                         $markerArray['###PLAYERID###'] = $sermon['uid'];
00249                         $markerArray['###PLAYER###'] = $audioplayer->getFlashPlayer($sermon['file'], $sermon['uid']);
00250                         $audioFileOutput .= $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($filearray,$markerArray);
00251                     }
00252                     $subpartArray['###FILES###']=$audioFileOutput;
00253                     $eventRowsOutput .= $this->substituteMarkersAndSubparts($singlerow,$markerArray,$subpartArray);
00254                 }
00255             }
00256             $subpartArray['###ROW###']=$eventRowsOutput;
00257         }
00258         return $this->substituteMarkersAndSubparts($subpart,$markerArray,$subpartArray);
00259     }
00260 
00268     function formatBytes($bytes) {
00269         $bytes = intval($bytes);
00270         if ($bytes > 1024) {
00271             $bytes /= 1024;
00272             if ($bytes > 1024) {
00273                 $bytes /= 1024;
00274                 $bytes_seperated = split('\.', $bytes);
00275                 $bytes = $bytes_seperated[0].$this->pi_getLL('decimalchar').substr($bytes_seperated[1], 0, 2).' MB';
00276             } else {
00277                 $bytes_seperated = split('\.', $bytes);
00278                 $bytes = $bytes_seperated[0].$this->pi_getLL('decimalchar').substr($bytes_seperated[1], 0, 2).' KB';
00279             }
00280         } else {
00281             $bytes .= ' B';
00282         }
00283         return $bytes;
00284     }
00285 
00293     function formatTime($seconds) {
00294         $seconds = intval($seconds);
00295         $content = '';
00296         $output = array();
00297         if ($seconds > 60) {
00298             $output[0] = $seconds - (60 * intval($seconds / 60));
00299             $seconds = intval($seconds / 60);
00300             if ($seconds > 60) {
00301                 $output[1] = $seconds - (60 * intval($seconds / 60));
00302                 $seconds = intval($seconds / 60);
00303                 if ($seconds > 60) {
00304                     $output[2] = $seconds - (60 * intval($seconds / 60));
00305                     $seconds = intval($seconds / 60);
00306                 } else {
00307                     $output[2] = $seconds;
00308                 }
00309             } else {
00310                 $output[1] = $seconds;
00311             }
00312         } else {
00313             $output[0] = $seconds;
00314         }
00315         switch (count($output)) {
00316             CASE 1:
00317                 $content = substr('00'.$output[0],-2,2).' s';
00318                 break;
00319             CASE 2:
00320                 $content = $output[1].':'.substr('00'.$output[0],-2,2).' Min';
00321                 break;
00322             CASE 3:
00323                 $content = $output[2].substr('00'.$output[1],-2,2).':'.substr('00'.$output[0],-2,2).'Std';
00324                 break;
00325             DEFAULT:
00326                 $content = '0 s';
00327         }
00328         return $content;
00329     }
00330 
00337     function getFileSizeFormarted($path) {
00338         if (@file_exists($path)) {
00339             $filesize = formatBytes(filesize($path));
00340         } else {
00341             $filesize = "0 MB";
00342         }
00343         return $filesize;
00344     }
